üìö Texas Hold'em Basics

Texas Hold'em is the most popular poker variant in the world. The goal is to make the best 5-card hand from 7 available cards (2 hole cards + 5 community cards) or to make all opponents fold.

Key Points:
  • Each player receives 2 hole cards ‚Äî only you can see them
  • 5 community cards are dealt on the table ‚Äî everyone can see them
  • You make the best hand from any 5 cards out of 7 available
  • Our app supports 2-6 players

üîÑ Game Phases

Showdown

Phase Details:

  1. Pre-Flop: Each player receives 2 hole cards. First betting round.
  2. Flop: 3 community cards are dealt. Second betting round.
  3. Turn: 4th community card is dealt. Third betting round.
  4. River: 5th (final) community card is dealt. Final betting round.
  5. Showdown: Remaining players reveal cards. Best hand wins.

üéÆ Available Actions

On your turn, you can perform one of the following actions:

Basic Actions:

FOLD

Discard your cards and exit the hand. You lose all bets made.

CHECK

Pass without betting. Only available if no one has raised!

CALL

Match the opponent's bet.

Aggressive Actions:

RAISE

Increase the bet. Minimum raise is the big blind amount.

ALL-IN

Bet all your chips.

ü§î Can I skip my turn (CHECK)?

Yes! CHECK is a standard action. You can check unlimited times per game, BUT only when your current bet equals the table's bet (no one has raised).

üí∞ Blinds (Forced Bets)

Small Blind

Player to the left of the dealer posts 1/2 of the minimum bet.

In our app: buy-in √ó 1%

Big Blind

Player to the left of small blind posts the full minimum bet.

In our app: buy-in √ó 2%

‚ùì FAQ

How many times can I CHECK per game?
Unlimited! CHECK is a standard action. The only requirement ‚Äî your bet must equal the current table bet.
What if I don't act in time?
You have 5 minutes for each action. If time expires, any player can call forceActionTimeout() and your action becomes FOLD.
Why is there a 10% commission?
10% rake is standard in online poker. These funds support the project and cover gas fees for VRF operations.
Can I see opponent's cards before showdown?
No! Cards are computed from VRF seed but stored only as a hash. Cards are revealed only at Showdown.
Minimum and maximum buy-in?
Minimum: 0.01 ETH | Maximum: 10 ETH
Blinds: small = 1%, big = 2% of buy-in.

üß† Basic Strategy Tips

For Beginners:

  • Play only strong starting hands (pairs, aces, kings)
  • Don't be afraid to FOLD ‚Äî it's normal!
  • Pay attention to position (late position = advantage)
  • Don't bet more than you can afford to lose

When to CHECK:

  • Weak hand but want to see next card for free
  • Strong hand to "trap" ‚Äî let opponent bluff
  • Not sure about your hand
  • Everyone checked ‚Äî you can check too
‚ö†Ô∏è Important: Poker involves chance. Even the best strategy doesn't guarantee winning every hand. Play responsibly!
